'''14w33c''' is the forty-eighth [[snapshot]] for [[Java Edition 1.8]], released on August 15, 2014,<ref>{{cite|url=https://web.archive.org/web/20140815000703/https://mojang.com/2014/08/minecraft-snapshot-14w33a/|title=Minecraft snapshot 14w33c|website=Mojang.com|author=[[Searge]]}}</ref> to fix a bug from [[14w33b]] that was creating holes in terrain generation.

== Fixes ==
{{fixes|fixedin=14w33c|prefix=Minecraft
|;old
|5962|When first loading a world, [[chest]]s and [[trapped chest]]s have a visual glitch in [[hotbar]].
|27538|[[Sand]] landing on [[snow]] slabs is inconsistent.
|;dev
|49937|[[Mob]]s can't swim.
|50506|Interblock culling not respecting rotation.
|53691|Game crashes when killed by {{cmd|worldborder}}.
|58186|[[Detector rail]] does not change texture if activated.
|62185|Whitelisting broken.
|63346|[[Lighting]] error at heights with multiples of 16.
|63365|L chest bug.
|63688|Game crashes when running world generated before [[14w30a]].
|64453|[[Armor]] doesn't render when looking from the inside.
|66238|The new [[door]]s have bigger items.
|67189|Wooden door types item texture has door knobs on opposite side.
|;previous
|67563|Missing areas in terrain generation.
}}</onlyinclude>

== Trivia ==
* 14w33c was previously removed from the [[launcher]] for some time, but was added back in September 2018.
